name: Loan Calculator With Chart
author: mgplugin

sections.description:
Loan Calculator is a special application that has been deliberately created for all types of users. a housewife, a student, a businessperson, an investor, a banker, a certified public accountant, a financial planner, etc.

Shortcode – [loan_calculator]

Features

  • Mobile friendly UI
  • Customize calculator body background color
  • Change calculator heading color with font size
  • Change calculator heading color with font size
  • Change calculator loan detail title and calculator texts color
  • Customize slider active and progress color
  • Customize slider thumb background and border color
  • Change result title color
  • Enable/ Disable total payment break-up and yearly payment breakdown chart
  • Customize payment break-up chart with chart type and color
  • Customize yearly payment breakdown chart with principal and interest paid color
  • Customize yearly payment breakdown chart with principal and interest paid color
  • Change calculator title text
  • Customize result title text setting
  • Customize payment break-up and yearly payment breakdown title text setting
  • Set min and max loan amount with default loan amount
  • Set min and max loan loan terms with default loan year
  • Set min and max loan loan interest with default loan interest
  • Loan Calculator
  • Mortgage Calculator
  • Add Investment
sections.installation:
1. Make sure you have Contact Form 7 installed.
  2. Download the file to install and activate.
  3. Done! Just remember to keep the plugins up to date!
